title: Ethanol demand, pest control impact corn market

content.description: Assume that more corn is used to produce ethanol. Simultaneously, more effective control of pests and weeds occurs in farming.
content.question: Which of the following will definitely occur in the corn market?

choices.label: The price of corn will increase.
The quantity of corn will decrease.
The price of corn will decrease.
The quantity of corn will increase.
The supply of corn will decrease.

content.answer: The quantity of corn will increase.

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
